title: Patti LuPone stuns Broadway as The Apologizer
description: On Instagram, Patti LuPone apologized after 500 Broadway artists asked her to stop bullying her fellow artists. The post Patti LuPone stuns Broadway as The Apologizer appeared first on AV Club.
author: Matt Schimkowitz

title: Court is now in session for Saul Goodman V. Jimmy McGill in exclusive book excerpt

title: The Bear: Carmy, Sydney and Richie Bare Their Souls in an Intense Season Finale — But Is It a Series Finale?
description: Warning: This post contains spoilers for the Season 4 finale of The Bear. The Bear’s Season 4 finale is titled “Goodbye” — and it kind of felt like it could’ve been a goodbye to the series as well. Hulu’s Emmy-winning dramedy wrapped up its fourth season by turning the spotlight on its three main characters — Carmy, […]
author: Dave Nemetz

title: And Just Like That Just Gave Us a Tiny Sex and the City Easter Egg — Do You Remember Her?
description: Warning: This post contains spoilers for Thursday’s And Just Like That. Seema’s trip to the bank this week on And Just Like That… may have given Sex and the City fans a serious case of déjà vu.
